title: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley
description: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley is a clicker science-based idle game where you get to delve into the prehistoric world of dinosaurs. Uncover hidden fossils and construct your own Jurassic simulation as you complete missions to earn fossil points, unlocking a diverse array of unique dinosaur species. Collect Trait Cards to automate fossil production, allowing for effortless point accumulation and triggering extinction events to expand your simulation even further. With each click, youâ€™ll watch your dinosaur collection flourish, transforming your simulation into a vibrant, thriving ecosystem where the majestic creatures of the Mesozoic Era reign supreme.
